pages.text: $(o)There's no hope for whatever you're aiming at...$()$(br2)The sharpest, most potent arrow you can get. It'll rip through anything in its way.$(br2)Though of course, you pay the price for its high damage. Netherite isn't an easy material to part with.
$(o)Deals 375% $(#55FF55)more$(0) damage than regular arrows.$(br2)Additionally, it experiences much less drop and can fly further and straighter.
